description:
Welcome to the Agile Connect Community!

Hello Agile Connect Porto Community, here comes our 25th Meetup!

You already noticed the different ways to share and learn about agility here in our community, once more this meetup will be different. We want to take the opportunity to have a informal conversation with Artur Margonari (https://www.linkedin.com/in/arturmargonari/) with an amazing glass of wine... Take a look, and don’t forget to RSVP.

Agenda:
• Totally open, what we know is we will start to drink wine and eat some amazing Portuguese snacks - drinks and snacks are not for free ;);

This informal conversation will be held in Portuguese or English!

This event is FREE to attend, but you have to register yourself first.

See you there & bring a friend!
name: 25th Porto Meetup - Agile Wine
